jd: From: Avinash Kumar, ZealHire Inc avinash@zealhire.com Reply to: avinash@zealhire.com Position: Lead Cloud EngineerLocation: RemoteDuration: Long-Term ContractVisa Status: Only USC/GC Desired Years of experience:- 14+ Years Job Description: USC/GCneed LinkedIn, VISA DL2 references Primarily remote, local candidates are required to report to OM, Canton or Owings Mills at least once per quarter CareFirst is looking for a Lead Cloud Engineer to support the implementation, 24x7 operational support, automation, availability, and performance management of CareFirst’s public cloud platforms. (80% Azure /10% AWS/10% Oracle Cloud). This infrastructure supports critical applications including Claims Processing, Enrollment, Financial and Portal Websites.Responsible for leading the evaluation of application and infrastructure cloud readiness, and work on the cloud migration plan to support on-premise migration to a cloud service Required-• 15+ years of overall IT architecture, infrastructure and/or administration experience • 4+ years of hands-on experience in multi-cloud platforms (Storage, Network, Backup, Database Support) – Azure VM experience required • Broad foundational IT skillset including supporting Azure Cloud services, Linux/Windows Operating Systems, server configurations (including networking, storage and security principals) • Hands-on automation and scripting experience Nice to have-• Azure Active Directory, Landing Zone, Microsoft Entra ID • Azure Architect certification, Active Azure Administrator certification or Azure Cloud Fundamentals certification • Prior healthcare payer experience • PowerShell scripting experience Education- Bachelor's
